Reviews.Title: Terrific video server. Best software feature control.
Reviews.Author: Bill Boswell
Reviews.Content: Very good reliable video server. Sorry it seems this unit had been discontinued. Have had another of these in service for over five years. Grab one if you can! ~ bill

ProductInfo.Features:
High performance & fully configurable MPEG-4 compression engine
Built-in web server
Optimal synchronization of video & audio
Intelligent motion detection
Adjustable network bandwidth
ProductInfo.Name: GV-ICT01 MPEG4 Universal Video & Audio Web Transmitter, Heavy Duty
